metadata.description: A CacheCluster inherits engine configuration from a CacheParameterGroup. The parameter group defines settings such as maxmemory-policy, timeout, and other engine-level options. The cluster's runtime behavior is governed by the parameter group it references.

patch.description: The CacheParameterGroup provides its name so the CacheCluster can reference it.
The CacheCluster uses the CacheParameterGroup name to inherit engine parameters.
